content: k2 k2tog repeat to end of round 63 sts round 10 *p1 k1 p1 k4 repeat to end of round round 11 decrease round *p1 k1 p1 ssk k2tog repeat to end of round 45 sts round 12 *p1 k1 p1 k2 repeat to end of round round 13 decrease round *p1 k1 p1 k2tog repeat to end of round 36 sts round 14 *p1 k1 repeat to end of round round 15 decrease round *p1 s2kp repeat to end of round 18 sts round 16 repeat round 14 round 17 decrease round *k2tog repeat to end of round 9 sts cut yarn levaing an 8 tail thread tail on darning needle and thread through stitches twice then remove needles and pull tight to close finishing weave in ends and block gently we used a bath of soak and tepid water pressing out excess water without twisting then laying flat to dry with brim turned up to desired length belle fille page 2 - www espacetricot com - © espace tricot 2022 - for personal use only
